data.title: Prescott, Arizona Tour Buses and Travel Planning
data.meta_description: We offer quality, affordable charter services with our tour buses in Arizona, pre-planned travel adventures, and national/international travel planning.
data.text:
Safety First

Your safety is our highest priority. Our coaches are inspected on a regular basis. We operate on the highest of safety standard.

With well over 1 million miles traveled, Master’s Touch has never had an accident or traffic violation. Our drivers are careful to operate the motor coach in a safe and efficient manner.

Equipment and operation of the motor coach industry are mandated by the federal government. Annual vehicle safety inspections are required. A current Master’s Touch inspection certificate is located on each motor coach.

Legal driving hours are also regulated by federal law. Our drivers will always operate within all transportation laws.

No matter where you are going, whether local or long distance, you will be in good hands with Master’s Touch.
